articles.author: Kyle Orland
articles.title: Why a bump to $700 could be a "death sentence" for the Steam Machine - Ars Technica
articles.description: Analysts expect Valve might be hit particularly hard by soaring RAM, storage prices.

articles.author: University of Oxford
articles.title: JWST uncovers rich organic chemistry in a nearby ultra-luminous infrared galaxy - Phys.org
articles.description: A study led by the Center for Astrobiology (CAB), CSIC-INTA, using modeling techniques developed at the University of Oxford, has uncovered an unprecedented richness of small organic molecules in the deeply obscured nucleus of a nearby galaxy, thanks to obser…
